page.title: 09THE MIDDLE SCHOOL-2 People
page.content: Children come to this school when they are 8yrs.old from Baddesley Ensor First School or Grendon C.E.First School.They leave to go to Atherstone School when they are 12yrs.old. Most children who attend this school live in Baddesley,Grendon or Baxterley There are two school buses every morning,although many children walk to school.About 100 children stay at school for their midday meal. The number of children on roll has fallen in the last 10yrs.from 320 to 150.This has meant a large reduction in teaching staff.There are now 5 female and 3 male teachers.Three perapatetic music teachers visit the school each week. We also have on the staff 1 caretaker, 3 cleaners,3 kitchen staff and 3 playground supervisors,all female.
